description: List project cost classifications with filtering and pagination.
permissions: Admins can view all project cost classifications. Non-admins can view records that are brokerless, belong to brokers they are members of, or are tied to brokers where they are a customer manager, a manager laborer, a laborer who can manage projects, or a planner or project manager for job production plans under those brokers customer organizations.
validation_notes: --has-broker must be a boolean value (true/false). --project-phase-cost-items accepts one or more project phase cost item IDs (comma-separated in the CLI).

flags.name: --project-phase-cost-items
flags.description: Filter by project phase cost item IDs (comma-separated)
